comment: This class is hard and you DEFINITELY have to work for your grade, but she isn't a bad professor. She is incredibly caring and knows a lot about the subject she's teaching. She's always willing to help her students, you only struggle in the class if you don't do your work and don't pay attention. She is really late at grading stuff which sucks.

WORST professor EVER! Dr. Ukuku wasn't specific in her instructions on assignments. She taught this course on a 4000+ level. She lectures HEAVY so be prepared to read. She's very disorganized. She's a last minute grader. She doesn't follow her syllabus. I would NOT recommend taking her if you care about your GPA.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: TERRIBLE! This class stressed me out with the overwhelming amount of work we had to do for LITTLE POINTS . Felt like I was taking a doctoral course. The class lacked structure and guidance. Her instructions were confusing and misleading. The test are hard to pass every question required an essay response. Rather get ran over by a car !
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Tough grader

comment: This professor is a professional when it comes to consuming your life with work. She provides you with 2 pages of instructions and ends up changing the assignment right before its due. Her class was horrible, she is disorganized, late grader, and doesnt not provide feedback that is useful. Dont ever take any of her classes.

She acts like shes the only class her students are taking. You literally write a whole essay for her quizzes and shell grade your papers hard. Shes not satisfied with other peoples writing. And she doesnt have you grade in the class postered ever.

I dont recommend this professor. Shes all over the place and shes not very clear when she gives instructions. She gives a lot of reading and we have quizzes on the readings. She doesnt explain anything and everyone is always confused.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--SO MANY PAPERS--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Her teaching approach can be better. You will often get confused on assignments. Lots of work. She has a good character I know she wants the best for students
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK
